channel.title: Whats aryan?
channel.description: Please no flaming or anything. What is aryan? :o I always wondered what it was,Im thinking its like moparisthebest or something. :| Can someone tell me? :confused:

item.title: Whats aryan?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

2: As big a job as killing Jagex and making sure their servers are never updated again[/quote]

Erm. Isnt the only main thing that needs to be fixed the regex patterns?

and 2 isn’t a problem, the problem is all the leechers, abusers and complete ass pirates who want aryan, and those are the only people who want aryan back anyway.

item.title: Whats aryan?
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

its a hacked runescape client which was used for autoing, it got past the traps and forced its actions to the server

it could run mutliple windows and it was very accurate since every object in runescape had its own number

it was open source so some people did things like change the client to show hp above peoples heads

it was very popular amounst leechers, they used level 3 accounts and basicly ruined runescape for the rest of everyone who played it, legit or otherwise

its dead now, jagex updated the runescape game engine and aryan couldnt connect anymore,

before it died, the developers added something which made it generate a user ID (UID) number which was negative, jagex claimed they had developed a sophiticated new macro detection, but really, aryans owns developers did this, every week or so there were mass bans as jagex banned everyone with the tell-tail negiative UID

this is a example of aryan bots

because of the way aryan sent its information, all the bots walked exactly the same path, this can be seen in this picture

if you want to see what aryan was like, the closest example is mopars private server client, MoparScape

Read full topic
